oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hallis Ellis and his mother
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Portrait of Hallis Ellis, as an infant, and his mother. As an adult, Hallis Ellis served as a Hardin County commissioner.
Hallis served 24 years as commissioner from Hardin County. He served as Judge Pro Tem with Judge Boyce Phillips as well as working as a farmer and sawmill operator.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Looking Back at Tennessee Photograph Collection, 1890-1981
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Group portraits; Infants; Mothers
